title: Services
description: System services management screen for monitoring and controlling Android background services

features.name: Running Services List
features.description: Display all currently running system and application services
features.developer_perspective: Essential for debugging background operations and service lifecycle

features.name: Service Information
features.description: Show detailed information about each service including PID, memory usage, status
features.developer_perspective: Critical for performance analysis and resource management

features.name: Service Control
features.description: Start, stop, or restart specific services
features.developer_perspective: Useful for testing service behavior and recovery scenarios

features.name: Service Monitoring
features.description: Real-time monitoring of service status and resource consumption
